<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get PIX static BR code image base64 contents"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pix/brcode/static/{pactualId}/base64"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns the static BR code image base64 contents.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"Guid":{"value":"4a801b0d-5b5f-4fa0-96ca-cf1a7cfad73d"}},"name":"pactualId","description":"The resource's unique identificator on BTG Pactual systems.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"examples":{"pixelsPerModule":{"value":"20"}},"name":"pixelsPerModule","description":"The number of pixels to use per QRCode module.\nDefault: 20","schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query","required":false},{"name":"imageType","description":"The image type: Gif, Jpeg or Png. Default: Png","schema":{"enum":["Gif","Jpeg","Png"],"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
